testcase.name: To Test the provided application for assignment
testcase.system-out: Given You need to be on Website.............................................passed When Click on Signup link...................................................passed And Enter First Name "Fassignment"..........................................passed And Enter Last Name "Lassignment"...........................................passed And Enter Email Id "Fassignment@Lassignment.com"............................passed And Enter User Name "Assignment_Assignment32"...............................passed And Enter Password "assignmentassignment"...................................passed And Enter Confirm Password "assignmentassignment"...........................passed And Click on Register button................................................passed And Successfully Registered message.........................................passed And Click on right corner dropdown..........................................passed And Validate the email Id "Fassignment@Lassignment.com".....................passed And Click on Homepage tab...................................................passed And Click on Compose........................................................passed And Enter Send to address "naveen"..........................................passed And Enter the Subject "Hi This is For Testing"..............................passed And Enter the Message.......................................................passed And Click on Send Message button............................................passed Then the acknowledgement is shown...........................................passed
